about_the_game:
This DLC contains the original soundtrack of Dragon Bros by Gabriele Caruso, our favorite artist from Manchester! It's full of chip-tunes and old school groove. You will never have enough.

WARNING: listening to it for too long can lead to excessive joy and elation. Please use carefully.

1- Spring Run - 3.58
2- Chewing Bricks - 2.19
3- Dragon Bros! - 1.47
4- Lost Cave - 2.12
5- RockFang - 1.04
6- Punch Harder - 3.19
7- Professor Processor - 2.14
8- Eat the Clouds - 2.15
9- A New Beginning - 1.47

name: Dragon Bros - Original Soundtrack
short_description: This DLC contains the original soundtrack of Dragon Bros! It's full of chip-tunes and old school groove. You will never have enough. WARNING: listening to it for too long can lead to excessive joy and elation. Please use carefully.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, French, German, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
